title: Vim
description: Vim is a highly configurable text editor built for efficient text editing.

snippets.Modes:
# Normal mode (default)
Press Esc

# Insert mode
i - Insert before cursor
I - Insert at beginning of line
a - Append after cursor
A - Append at end of line
o - Open new line below
O - Open new line above

# Visual mode
v - Character-wise visual
V - Line-wise visual
Ctrl+v - Block-wise visual

# Command mode
: - Enter command mode
snippets.Navigation:
# Basic movement
h - Left
j - Down
k - Up
l - Right

# Word movement
w - Next word
b - Previous word
e - End of word

# Line movement
0 - Start of line
$ - End of line
^ - First non-blank character

# File movement
gg - Go to first line
G - Go to last line
:42 - Go to line 42
snippets.Editing:
# Delete
x - Delete character
dw - Delete word
dd - Delete line
D - Delete to end of line

# Copy (yank)
yy - Copy line
yw - Copy word
y$ - Copy to end of line

# Paste
p - Paste after cursor
P - Paste before cursor

# Undo/Redo
u - Undo
Ctrl+r - Redo
snippets.Search & Replace:
# Search
/pattern - Search forward
?pattern - Search backward
n - Next match
N - Previous match

# Replace
:s/old/new/ - Replace first in line
:s/old/new/g - Replace all in line
:%s/old/new/g - Replace all in file
:%s/old/new/gc - Replace with confirmation
snippets.Save & Quit:
# Save
:w - Write (save)
:w filename - Save as

# Quit
:q - Quit
:q! - Quit without saving
:wq - Save and quit
:x - Save and quit
ZZ - Save and quit

# Save all and quit
:wqa
snippets.Multiple Files:
# Open files
:e filename - Edit file
:tabnew filename - New tab

# Buffers
:ls - List buffers
:b2 - Switch to buffer 2
:bn - Next buffer
:bp - Previous buffer

# Tabs
gt - Next tab
gT - Previous tab
:tabc - Close tab
snippets.Visual Mode:
# Select
v - Start visual mode
V - Select line
Ctrl+v - Select block

# Operations
d - Delete selection
y - Copy selection
c - Change selection
> - Indent
< - Unindent
snippets.Advanced:
# Macros
qa - Start recording macro 'a'
q - Stop recording
@a - Play macro 'a'
@@ - Repeat last macro

# Marks
ma - Set mark 'a'
'a - Jump to mark 'a'

# Fold
zf - Create fold
zo - Open fold
zc - Close fold
